unnormalised: He used to be Mr. Sharma, the Sales Manager, but after the Q3 results, they promoted him to VP, Sales and Marketing. Now everyone calls him VP Sharma, it's quite a change!
normalised: He used to be Mister Sharma, the Sales Manager, but after the Q three results, they promoted him to V-P, Sales and Marketing. Now everyone calls him V-P Sharma, it's quite a change!
